abstract.t: This document describes the MISP galaxy format which describes a simple JSON format to represent galaxies and clusters that can be attached to MISP events or attributes. A public directory of MISP galaxies is available and relies on the MISP galaxy format. MISP galaxies are used to add further informations on a MISP event. MISP galaxy is a public repository [MISP-G] of known malware, threats actors and various other collections of data that can be used to mark, classify or label data in threat information sharing.
